definition: an action aimed at evading an opponent, perform a movement in military or naval tactics in order to secure an advantage in attack or defense
details:
noun
- an action aimed at evading an opponent
= synonyms: manoeuvre, evasive action
- a move made to gain a tactical end
= synonyms: manoeuvre, tactical maneuver, tactical manoeuvre
- a deliberate coordinated movement requiring dexterity and skill
= example: a deliberate coordinated movement requiring dexterity and skill
= synonyms: play
- a military training exercise
= synonyms: manoeuvre, simulated military operation
- a plan for attaining a particular goal
= synonyms: manoeuvre, tactic, tactics
verb
- perform a movement in military or naval tactics in order to secure an advantage in attack or defense
= synonyms: manoeuvre, operate, manoeuver
- direct the course
= synonyms: direct, manoeuvre, head, steer, point, guide, manoeuver, channelize, channelise
- act in order to achieve a certain goal
= example: act in order to achieve a certain goal
= synonyms: manoeuvre, manoeuver
